comment: My phone is samsung galaxy a52s 5g and on my phone on tiktok some filters doesnt look the same as it looks on iPhones. On my phone they're all messed up and sometimes when i turn filter on my screen where i record got blured. I dont have option to save video but without the tiktok sing. Also i dont have some other options as other phones.. please my phone is from 2021 its not that old can you please update that mine phone amd other have new update ?
scenarios:
On a Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G, some filters on TikTok do not look the same as they do on iPhones. On the Samsung device, the filters appear messed up, and sometimes turning on a filter causes the recording screen to become blurred.
There is no option on the Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G to save a video without the TikTok watermark.
The user does not have some options available on other phones within the TikTok app.
key sentence: There is no option on the Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G to save a video without the TikTok watermark.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to record and enhance videos, adjust playback speed, add effects, sound, text, music, and post videos.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Record video', 'description': 'Record a video'}, {'name': 'Add sound', 'description': 'Add sound to the video'}, {'name': 'Flip', 'description': 'Flip the camera'}, {'name': 'Effects', 'description': 'Add effects to the video'}, {'name': 'Upload', 'description': 'Upload the video'}, {'name': 'Speed', 'description': 'Adjust the speed of the video'}, {'name': 'Retouch', 'description': 'Retouch the video'}, {'name': 'Mic', 'description': 'Enable or disable microphone'}, {'name': 'Filters', 'description': 'Apply filters to the video'}, {'name': 'Timer', 'description': 'Set a timer for recording'}, {'name': 'Flash', 'description': 'Enable or disable flash'}, {'name': 'Close', 'description': 'Close the current screen'}, {'name': 'Text', 'description': 'Add text to the video'}, {'name': 'Camera', 'description': 'Switch between front and back camera'}, {'name': 'Templates', 'description': 'Choose a template for the video'}]
